channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 13:26 Air alert in Kirovohrad region. Stay tuned for further reports.
item.description: 🔴 13:26 Air alert in Kirovohrad region. Stay tuned for further reports. #Кировоградська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
